response.answer_text: I’m not sure what you mean by “CPA” in this context. Certified Public Accountants are very effective. It is not easy to earn the CPA distinction in the USA. You must pass one of the toughest licensing exams in the world to get it. Most CPAs are very good at their jobs and take it very seriously. Having been a CPA working with international companies I can tell you honestly that US CPAs are, in general, better than certified accountants from other countries (although they can be very good also).
